definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְטָֽחֲנוּ]] Nu 11:8; Impf. [[וַיִּטְחַן]] Ex 32:20; 3 fs. [[תִּטְחַן]] Job 31:10; 2 mpl. [[תִּטְחָָנוּ]] Is 3:15; Inf. abs. [[טָחוֹן]] De 9:21; Imv. fs. [[טַחֲנִי]] Is 47:2; Pt. [[טוֹחֵן]] Ju Jdg 16:21; [[טׂחֲנוֹת]] Ec 12:3; —grind, the work of women, c. acc., with millstones [[רֵחַיִם]] Nu 11:8 (JE; obj. the manna), Is 47:2 (obj. [[קָָמַח]]), this fig. of humiliation of Babylon; abs. Ju Jdg 16:21; [[תטחן לאחר אשׁתי]] Job 31:10, i.e. serve him as his slave; no obj. expr. Ex 32:20 (E), De 9:21 (of golden calf); [[הַטּׂחֲנוֹת]] Ec 12:3 = the teeth (cf. Ar. t.awa0h.inu molar teeth; so in Lexx Syr. t.ah.on0to0, t.ah.onoyoto0); ´[[פְּנֵי עֲנִיִּים ט]] Is 3:15 the face of the poor ye grind, fig. of extreme oppression.
